name: The Great Attractor
description:
The last celestial object in the universe has been sucked into a Black Hole.
Things might look bleak, but Fletcher just found a joke book; maybe that'll cheer people up.

Explore a space station in this short Point & Click adventure. Meet an ancient tentacle monster who's trying to play his favourite MMO, a bookworm who's sensory mods make everything taste too good, and a robot that still runs on Windows Vista.

The Great Attractor was made in just five days.

https://pracystudios.com/
